content: a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4-5 single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 stuff the tip of the hat 7 decrease x 6= 6 change to color c 8 single_crochet in each st around 9 increase 2 single_crochet x 2= 8 10-11 single_crochet in each st around 12 increase 3 single_crochet x 2= 10 13-14 single_crochet in each st around 15 increase 4 single_crochet x 2= 12 16-17 single_crochet in each st around 18 increase 5 single_crochet x 2= 14 19-20 single_crochet in each st around 21 increase 6 single_crochet x 2= 16 22-23 single_crochet in each st around 24 increase 7 single_crochet x 2= 18 25 increase 8 single_crochet x 2= 20 26 single_crochet in each st around 27 increase 9 single_crochet x 2= 22 28 increase 10 single_crochet x 2= 24 29 increase 11 single_crochet x 2= 26 30 increase 12 single_crochet x 2= 28 31 increase 13 single_crochet x 2= 30 32 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 33 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 34 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 35 single_crochet in each st around change to color b 36 flo single_crochet in each st around 37 single_crochet in each st around f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 8 assembly face 1 pin the face mask onto the head sew the face mask onto the face 2 pin the nose onto the face under the face mask 3 sew the nose onto the face sweet oddity art 9 belly 1 pin the belly onto the front of the body 2 sew the belly onto the body sweet oddity art 10 feet 1 pin the feet onto the front of the body 2 sew the feet onto the body wings 1 pin the wings onto the side of the body approximately between rounds 18 and 19 2 sew the wings onto the body sweet oddity art 11 tail 1 pin the tail onto the back of the body 2 sew the tail onto the body sweet oddity art 12 hat 1 pin the hat onto the top of the head 2 sew the hat onto the head you have your finished penguin thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished penguin with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 13 helpful tips exact colors used 1 teal premier parfait seaglass 2 white premier parfait white 3 yellow premier parfait yellow 4 variegated red heart retro stripes you can use different eye sizes you might have to adjust the placements if you change the sizes you can use different hook sizes and weights of yarn it will just change the size of your penguin and you might need to adjust eye placement how you stuff
